 3.3 - INPUT ASSISTANCE
ERROR IDENTIFICATION(LEVEL A)
On accessible websites...

If an input error is automatically detected, the item that is in error is
identified and the error is described to the user in text. 

These websites...

Help users avoid and correct mistakes.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
This Success Criterion does not mean that color or text styles cannot be used to
indicate errors. It simply requires that errors also be identified using text.
In this example, two asterisks are used in addition to color.
